properties.description: Hotel NYX Cancun is a holiday resort in the Cancun with spa, 4 restaurants, 2 bars and a friendly staff. The rooms are equipped to provide comfort and most of them have overlooking views to the sea.
properties.name: Hotel NYX Cancun

properties.description: Located in Punta Cancún, the Hotel Krystal Cancun is a beachfront hotel with swimming pools, sun terrace, bars and restaurants, comfortable rooms, meeting rooms, water sports, playground, animation and direct access to the beach.
properties.name: Hotel Krystal Cancún

properties.description: 5-star hotel by the beach in Cancun.

properties.description: The Hotel Riu Cancun is a 5-star All Inclusive hotel in Cancun's most popular area for tourists. The hotel has prime location on a white sandy beach and provides comfort rooms, spa area, gym and Jacuzzi, 3 swimming pools and infinity pool.
properties.name: Hotel Riu Cancun

properties.description: Located on the beach of Cancún, the Hotel Riu Palace Las Americas is a 5-star Adults Only hotel in Cancun with All Inclusive board, concierge service, comfort suites, entertainment program, spa area, water sports, 3 pools and more.
properties.name: Hotel Riu Palace Las Americas

properties.description: Located right on the beach in Cancun, the Riu Caribe is a 5-star hotel with comfort rooms, All Inclusive 24 hours, free Wi-Fi, 3 swimming pools, wellness center, entertainment programme for adults and children, water sports and Pacha club.
properties.name: Hotel Riu Caribe
Hilton Cancun Mar Caribe All-Inclusive Resort

properties.name: Beachscape Kin Ha Villas & Suites

properties.description: El Hotel Dos Playas Faranda Cancún es un hotel todo incluido próximo al muelle de Playa Tortugas, Cancún. El hotel posee habitaciones modernas, albercas, restaurantes, sushi bar, gimnasio, masajes en la playa, servicio de bodas y otros servicios.
properties.name: Hotel Dos Playas Faranda

properties.description: The Occidental Costa Cancún hotel (belonging to the Barceló Hotel Group) faces the Caribbean Sea on the famous Boulevard Kukulcán. Your visit to Linda Beach makes this hotel a stunning vacation destination where you can enjoy maximum relaxation.
properties.name: Occidental Costa Cancún

properties.description: Located in the center of Cancun and next to Hotel Zone, the Krystal Urban Cancun & Beach Club Hotel features modern accommodation with meeting rooms, several bars and restaurants, pool, gym, beach club, parking, meeting rooms and business center.
properties.name: Krystal Urban Cancún & Beach Club

properties.description: Hotel Riu Ventura on Delfines Beach in Cancun offers 24-hour All Inclusive service, 6 pools, diverse dining options, and entertainment for all ages. Enjoy the Caribbean paradise with family activities, RIULand for kids, and Renova Spa for relaxation.
properties.name: Hotel Riu Ventura

properties.description: El Hotel Maya Caribe se encuentra en primera línea de la playa de Cancún ofreciendo una terraza solárium con tumbonas, parqueadero, minimarket, masajes, restaurante, bar, gimnasio, alberca y servicio de bodas.
properties.name: Hotel Maya Caribe

properties.description: El Hotel Imperial Laguna ofrece un alojamiento de larga estadía con alberca con vistas a la laguna, terraza solárium, desayuno de cortesía, Wi-Fi, parqueadero en el exterior, recepción 24 horas, entre otros servicios.
properties.name: Hotel Imperial Laguna
